document.title: Tennessee Academic Standards for Fine Arts

9FC7871F96F74DF5B98C664644BCBEE9.description:
Critically investigate and strategically interact with legal,
technological, systemic, and contexts of media arts.

02F1B5D21FF6476DA47631A4A2B14A6F.description:
Critically investigate and ethically interact with legal,
technological, systemic, and contexts of media arts, while considering ethics,
media literacy, digital identity, and artist/audience interactivity.

A19A4FFD4CD54EE69E1D5E7A7583403F.description:
Critically evaluate and effectively interact with legal,
technological, systemic, and contexts of media arts, while considering ethics,
media literacy, social media, virtual worlds, and digitalidentity.

6D89F49D42704DC89325511FA57E7A18.description:
Demonstrate the relationships of media arts ideas and works to
personal and global contexts, purposes, and values through relevant and
impactful media artworks.

5CB5E9CB80024B55B33B8840598E1330.description:
Examine in-depth and demonstrate the relationships of media
arts ideas and works to various contexts, purposes, and values, such as markets,
systems, propaganda, and truth.

78449BE893544E4EAE0E49B4DBBDBB1A.description:
Demonstrate and show how media artworks and ideas relate to
various contexts, purposes, and values.

3412C54C9A0E4C91B3B4BBC0A695DEC0.description: Relate artistic ideas and works with societal, cultural, and historical context.

1F25754D561D486F9B5E3821845D1FFC.description:
Demonstrate and expound on the use of media artworks to
consummate new meaning, knowledge, and impactful cultural experiences.

85688923B49B4D49BB8AA32834CB2C74.description:
Explain and demonstrate the use of media artwork tosynthesize
new meaning and knowledge and form cultural experiences and connections
between themes and ideas, local and global networks, and personalinfluence.

5DCB623882F24E16BD7914BD6A40A58E.description:
Explain and demonstrate the use of media artworks to expand
meaning and knowledge, and create cultural experiences in emerging
presentation spaces.

D4683DFC26AE4245AA749C9BE762971D.description:
Independently and proactively access relevant and
qualitative resources to inform the creation of cogent media artworks.

52BF2D45F03D4B14B575A7936913A243.description:
Synthesize internal and external resources, such as
cultural connections, introspection, research, and exemplary works, to
enhance the creation of persuasive media artworks.

9764825E8D644DDE8114FF73656A0FF7.description:
Access, evaluate, and integrate personal and external
resources, such as experiences, interests, and cultural experiences, to
inform the creation of original media artworks.

3CF8B6C9C5E041E38DCDF735C3234F36.description: Synthesize and relate knowledge and personal experiences to make art.

286A737D26054F6D8549A1BA4EAB91A1.description:
Independently develop rigorous evaluations of and
strategically seek feedback for media artworks and production processes,
considering complex goals and factors.

A72FC77472E248A8BD4935733C299C33.description:
Form and apply defensible evaluations in the constructive
and systematic critique of media artworks and production processes.

5FB2AE749464484A9D21BFC5CAF1D8D9.description:
Evaluate media art works and production processes at
decisive stages, using identified criteria, and considering context and artistic
goals.

B4B310E1352F4EDB8FC734BDC118537F.description: Apply criteria to evaluate artistic work.

DE4AA981F69846EE82E24C1E7E16FE86.description:
Analyze the intent, meanings, and impacts of diverse media
artworks, considering complex factors of context and bias.

8952A5FC70954E5AADECA6ECBC94E5AF.description:
Analyze the intent, meanings, and influence of media
artworks, based on personal, societal, historical, and culturalcontexts.

76FBDD7E320F459BBA0A55A08E709B28.description:
Analyze the intent, meanings, and reception of media
artworks, focusing on personal and cultural contexts.

6EFB96297F33431F82CB665379FC5FEF.description: Interpret intent and meaning in artistic work.

95AF0E9E04424182B3BFF64CF87A0F9B.description:
Survey an exemplary range of media artworks, analyzing
methods for managing audience experience, to create intention and
persuasion through multimodal perception and systemic communications.

8013EB1DA5B1401B88AB53F71E839603.description:
Analyze and synthesize the qualities and relationships of the
components in a variety of media artworks, and feedback on how they
impact audience.

20425E29452B463FAEA8C5836004EC1C.description:
Analyze how a variety of media artworks manage audience
experience and create intention through multimodal perception.

08F150C2D914421B87812E17D2FC0D63.description:
Analyze and synthesize the qualities and relationships of
the components and audience impact in a variety of media artworks.

2343D4994694481E8AE4BCA57D3065B7.description:
Analyze and synthesize the qualities and relationships of
the components in a variety of media artworks and feedback on how they
impact an audience.

C49089194B084DB8AEA7404D0302D000.description:
Analyze the qualities of and relationships between the
components, style, and preferences communicated by media artworks and
artists.

86AC9230C16F4AF59385069476C7C109.description:
Independently evaluate, compare, and integrate improvements
in presenting media artworks, considering personal to global impacts, such as
new understandings that were gained by artist and audience.

B54D74D744CA49059F2E4E3FB366B71D.description:
Evaluate and implement improvements in presenting media
artworks, considering personal, local, and social impacts.

0FE92F92138A4370AB3EDDD3B06F05D4.description:
Evaluate and implement improvements in presenting media
artworks, considering personal and local impacts.

76A8E73582D24A13A56FA64ACEDF3B6B.description:
Curate, design, and promote the presentation and distribution
of media artworks for intentional impacts, through a variety of contexts, such
as markets and venues.

7E5366C0474142F7A92C8E1672303DBF.description:
Curate and design the presentation and distribution of
collections of media artworks through a variety of contexts.

24F71FB06D4040FB8250083696E3A24D.description:
Design the presentation and distribution of collections of
media artworks, considering combinations of artworks, formats, and
audiences.

DFB12AA9C6804D19B74B11F0BA210B00.description: Convey meaning through the presentation of artistic work.

CAC8213C8EA34769B357153D308AD073.description:
Independently utilize and adapt tools, styles, and systems in
standard, innovative, and experimental ways.

ABEE37C4506F4D299CA252E73FADB123.description:
Demonstrate the skillful adaptation and combination oftools,
styles, techniques, and interactivity to achieve specific expressivegoals.

3EA5F43E05DD44D4BDBEC8E1D05474C6.description:
Demonstrate adaptation and innovation through the
combination of tools, techniques, and content in standard and innovative
ways to communicate intent.

9DBB4D28A45248D59A0F938444795B47.description:
Demonstrate command of creative and innovative
adaptability in formulating lines of inquiry and solutions to address complex
challenges within and through media arts productions.

0C819E1334174D08855CF6419FF72B2F.description:
Demonstrate command of creative and adaptive innovation
abilities to address sophisticated challenges within and through media arts
productions.

BE12B1EF2BAE4DF692BFBCD493E7C44C.description:
Develop and refine a determined range of creative and
adaptive innovation abilities in addressing identified challenges and
constraints within and through media arts productions.

20C7DC98745C42119ED788AB82B51DC9.description:
Demonstrate command of creative problem solving when
managing and producing media artworks productions.

36A48F00647C400CA60A94FAFAFCEB2F.description:
Demonstrate command of design, artistic, technical, and soft
skills in managing and producing media artworks.

B7089C2BBA744EAFB89808230F1462CD.description:
Demonstrate progression in design, artistic, technical, and
soft skills, as a result of selecting and fulfilling specified roles in the
production of a variety of media artworks.

A629FD3819D941F49428835B15327E5E.description: Develop and refine artistic techniques and work for production.

FAA3F818B7C645B6989363869886E99A.description:
Synthesize various arts, media arts forms, and academic
content into unified media arts productions that retain artistic fidelity across
platforms.

8F813E8E11784140B39565548C8A9A24.description:
Integrate various arts, media arts forms, and academic
content into unified media arts productions that retain thematic integrityand
stylistic continuity.

A788282ADA6C417B904F0C7E5B68966C.description:
Integrate various arts, media arts forms, and content into
unified media arts productions, considering the reaction and interactionof
the audience.

3657EA01FD574F839FFA0D7655C650FD.description: Select, analyze, and interpret artistic work for producing.

9DE8D602407E488F9C65F4C7B5DBDAF5.description:
Intentionally refine and take risks with various components
to form impactful expressions in media artworks, directed at specific
purposes, audiences, and contexts.

DD480618C5574E3C9A82364D7F139093.description:
Refine and take risks with aesthetic components to
intentionally form impactful expressions in media artworks for specific
purposes, intentions, audiences, and contexts.

6A372C057B684E95A52A573EB161EA4F.description:
Refine and modify media artworks, honing aesthetic quality
and intentionally accentuating stylistic elements, to reflect personal goals
and preferences.

A6EA7CEAD0B7490ABADA519A185C5A9F.description:
Synthesize content, processes, and components to express
compelling purpose, story, emotion, or ideas in complex media arts
productions, demonstrating mastery of associated principles, such as
hybridization.

102442FB8D8D41F896F2FF1EF106832E.description:
Demonstrate deliberate choices in organizing and
integrating content, personal aesthetic, and stylistic conventions increation
and production processes.

EB79B5D7479F4E55A6F1AE64B7656C64.description:
Demonstrate deliberate choices in organizing and
integrating stylistic conventions and aesthetics to convey meaning in
creation and production processes.

3867D031426A4E54A2CA1CDFFF244A81.description:
Integrate a sophisticated personal aesthetic and knowledge
of systems processes in forming, testing, and proposing original artistic
ideas, prototypes, and production frameworks, considering complex
constraints of goals, time, resources, and personal limitations.

3196DBD96C074FF190F5AC034ECD93C7.description:
Apply a personal aesthetic in designing, testing, and
refining original artistic ideas, prototypes, and production strategiesfor
media arts productions, considering artistic intentions, constraints of
resources, and presentation context.

DD9E94D77E574CEBBDC3596589EC944C.description:
Apply aesthetic criteria in developing, proposing, and
refining artistic ideas, plans, and prototypes for media artsproductions,
considering original inspirations, goals, and presentationcontext.

0B930D8EC5BC4CAC9DE90A6E7B970FB4.description: Organize and develop artistic ideas and work.

A74E7304E929445FA2D23841261437C4.description:
Integrate aesthetic principles with a variety of generative
methods to fluently form original ideas, solutions, and innovations in media
arts creation processes.

56EE571B642C4D798CA3FE3E8F12C4F9.description:
Strategically utilize generative methods to formulate multiple
ideas, refine artistic goals, and increase the originality of approaches in
media arts creation processes.

D622DB51967B492F830DF4DB586F7568.description:
Use identified methods to develop artistic goals,formulate
multiple ideas, and problem solve in media arts.

89EE3527A72C437289C4ED70463E9706.description: Generate and conceptualize artistic ideas and work.
